1) ","params":{"_depositAmount":"deposit amount, in reserve token ","_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"purchase return amount"}},"calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256)":{"details":"given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)     * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO))) ","params":{"_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_sellAmount":"sell amount, in the continuous token itself ","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"sale return amount"}}},"title":"Bancor formula by Bancor  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements; and to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0. \""},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/C/Users/cedri/OneDrive/Dokumente/GitHub/Dapp-token/contracts/bancor/BancorFormula.sol":"BancorFormula"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/C/Users/cedri/OneDrive/Dokumente/GitHub/Dapp-token/contracts/bancor/BancorFormula.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0fbcd8263243d248408bbb860b11c85958b1702fbc523e8e2567e9241755bad2","urls":["bzz-raw://726a16ad1954e19eb0f9eb02f98f9e7d80d162312622baecd4906fb57e6141eb","dweb:/ipfs/QmfNE1o98QeAHxyfKWoP1HufbxBLnp6CjbvkhLYp5XG7EY"]},"/C/Users/cedri/OneDrive/Dokumente/GitHub/Dapp-token/contracts/bancor/Power.sol":{"keccak256":"0x89ea301326fde231cf80ed250e70780c13b548cc98e151873eddbafaec9d7459","urls":["bzz-raw://0533787f32d7ac67cf5c4eda92df5098898c242457a2e94a75787aebbe749cb8","dweb:/ipfs/QmZCtKmzPbpjht47sHxN3CzuJnW8pRVnpGxUsCAS5foSPm"]},"/C/Users/cedri/OneDrive/Dokumente/GitHub/Dapp-token/contracts/oz/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9be965a852ec2639582c5d2ae908f1bc155d7d81a75b7e06bd9f6daaa8b6e706","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ef21abd86994777bf873939f57f1bcfa2b41ef815897c1db57dc5dac09ef2f91","dweb:/ipfs/QmTPmB5gPKfW9Lmx2Q6B28aAqjXCBPYAHWNn2oK7BUyWVj"]}},"version":1}

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256,.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio, and a deposit amount (in the reserve token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the continuous token)     * Formula: Return = _supply * ((1 + _depositAmount / _reserveBalance) ^ (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO) - 1)

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)     * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))

params._reserveRatio: constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000
params._sellAmount: sell amount, in the continuous token itself
